function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inability to differentiate COVID-19 from other viral infections","Impact":"Misdiagnosis and incorrect treatment of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Developing specific algorithms or sensors for detecting COVID-19","Technologies":"Advanced sensor technology for specific virus detection","People":"Public health organizations, healthcare providers","Owner":"Research institutions, sensor technology companies"},{"Description":"Sample bias due to limited access to wearable devices by older people and low-income populations","Impact":"Underrepresentation of certain demographic groups in disease monitoring","Mitigation":"Providing accessible wearable devices for all demographic groups","Technologies":"Low-cost wearable sensor technology, outreach programs","People":"Low-income populations, older individuals","Owner":"Government health agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Dependency on large datasets for training detection algorithms","Impact":"Delay in deploying new detection methods for emerging pathogens","Mitigation":"Developing faster algorithms that require smaller datasets, or finding alternative ways to collect large datasets","Technologies":"Advanced algorithm development, data collection techniques","People":"Research institutions, data scientists","Owner":"Technology companies, government research organizations"}]}
